attributes.action: call for a public inquiery into grooming gangs all around the uk
attributes.additional_details: the current and previous goverment have not wanted a public inquiery into the grooming gangs, the so called inquiery they have had did not look into grooming gangs
attributes.background: the goverment are not wanting to hold a inquiery they have voted againt the will of the british people we need to show them that this is somthing we want and the goverment are blocking it

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:

Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
